description: Fake fish made primarily of tuna and potatoes.

directions.step: Boil the potatoes with the skin still on, take the skin off and mash them in a large mixing bowl.
Hard boil the eggs, take of the shell and set aside a round slice of egg for decoration.
Put remainder of eggs in a food processor, add the tuna and mix.
Add the egg and tuna mixture to the potatoes and mix well.
Add mayonnaise to the mixture until the consistency is that of creamy mashed potatoes.
Set aside one pickle, a few kalamata olives and a few pimento olives for decorations.
Dice the rest of the pickles, kalamata and pimento olives.
Add them to the mixture along with the capers.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Form the mixture into the shape of a fish (either one large one on a platter or individual portions on plates).
Decorate as desired using sliced carrots, egg, pickles, and the olives that were set aside earlier. (feel free to experiment!)
